faq.heroSubtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our concrete and wood fence services.
faq.concreteQ1: How long should I wait to walk or park my car on new concrete?
faq.concreteA1: You can walk on it after 24 hours. For light vehicles, we recommend waiting at least 7 days, and for trucks or heavy machinery, 28 days is ideal (when concrete reaches maximum strength).
faq.concreteA2: Concrete tends to expand and contract. To prevent uncontrolled cracking, we install strategic control joints. This guides any natural movement and maintains the surface aesthetics.
faq.concreteQ3: Is it necessary to seal concrete?
faq.concreteA3: Yes, we strongly recommend it. Sealing protects against oil stains, chemicals, and sun wear, doubling the life of your investment.
faq.fenceQ1: What type of wood do you use?
faq.fenceA1: We mainly work with Cedar (naturally resistant to rot and insects) and pressure-treated Pine (a durable and economical option). We can advise which best fits your budget.
faq.fenceQ2: How long does a wood fence last?
faq.fenceA2: With proper maintenance (cleaning and sealing every 2-3 years), a quality fence can last 15 to 20 years.
faq.fenceA3: We can guide you through the process. Regulations generally vary by city or homeowners association (HOA). We provide the plans or technical specifications you need for the process.
faq.generalQ1: Do you offer free, no-obligation quotes?
faq.generalA1: Absolutely! We visit your property, take measurements, and provide a detailed quote at no cost.
faq.notFoundCta: Didn't find what you were looking for?
faq.notFoundCtaDesc: We're here to help. Contact us and we'll answer all your questions.

about.heroSubtitle: Your partner for comprehensive property solutions: concrete and wood fences with the highest quality.
about.story1: JCKAY GROUP was founded with a clear mission: to offer concrete and wood fence solutions with expertise, integrity, and exceptional customer service.
about.story2: What started as a family business has grown into a trusted name in concrete finishes and wood fences, serving residential and commercial clients.
about.story3: Our passion for quality and attention to detail has earned us a reputation for excellence on every project, from small repairs to major works.
about.missionText: At JCKAY GROUP, our mission is to enhance the value, functionality, and beauty of our clients' properties through expert craftsmanship, innovative solutions, and exceptional service. We are committed to delivering quality results that exceed expectations and stand the test of time.
about.experiencedDesc: Our team brings years of experience and specialized knowledge in concrete and wood fences to every project.
about.qualityDesc: We take pride in our attention to detail and commitment to the highest quality on every project.
about.satisfactionDesc: Your satisfaction is our priority. We work with you to make your vision a reality.
about.comprehensiveDesc: From concrete and fences to repairs and maintenance, we offer solutions for your property needs.
about.timelyDesc: We value your time and are committed to completing projects efficiently without sacrificing quality.
about.pricingDesc: We offer fair, transparent pricing for all our services, delivering the best value for your investment.
about.ctaSubtitle: Contact us today to discuss your project and discover how JCKAY GROUP can bring your vision to life.
